entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
